name: Shoulder Press, Dumbbells
how_to_perform:
# Shoulder Press, Dumbbells
1. Choose a pair of dumbbells with an appropriate weight for your fitness level.
2. Stand or sit up straight while holding a dumbbell in each hand.
3. Begin with your arms at your sides and palms facing forward. 
4. Lift the dumbbells up over your head, keeping your elbows slightly bent and palms facing forward as you raise them. Make sure to keep proper posture throughout the movement.
5. Slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position, focusing on control and precision with each repetition.

6. Keep your core engaged and maintain good posture during this exercise.
short_summary: A classic upper body exercise that targets the muscles of the shoulders effectively using dumbbells
